statements: UPDATE influencer_marketing_campaigns SET campaign_budget = 5000.00, campaign_start_date = '2022-07-01', campaign_end_date = '2022-08-31' WHERE campaign_id = 1

UPDATE influencer_campaigns SET influencer_name = 'Alice', campaign_name = 'Summer Sale' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ab_test_results SET test_name = 'Homepage Redesign' , test_variation = 'Option A', clicks = clicks + 10, conversions = conversions + 2 WHERE test_id = 3 AND campaign_id = 5;
